description: The island's only gas provider has raised prices by 6.5% to compensate for losses during the lockdown.
title: Coronavirus: Jersey Gas assistance bid rejected by States Assembly
title_page: Coronavirus: Jersey Gas assistance bid rejected by States Assembly - BBC News
maintext: "We have given the Jersey Government the same detailed financial information, including all historic financial information and forward-looking forecasts, that is required of any business looking for access to the payroll co-funding scheme," he said.
